item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description:
• Added settings menu
  • Added automatic updating
  • Improved dialog instructions

item.title: Version 0.1.2
item.description:
• Added support for non-symbols
  • Improved credential input stability
  • Added support for using Airtable attachments for image data

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
• Added support getting specific records
  • Fix number in textlayer bug
  • Added support for regular layers

item.title: Version 0.3.0
item.description:
• Added support for overriding variable names in symbol title
  • Fix text returning "undefined" when no data
  • Fix not being able to use symbols from libraries

item.title: Version 0.3.1
item.description: • Fix bug: Getting records with "0" in ID fails.

item.title: Version 0.4.0
item.description:
• Added support for selecting specific view.
  • Improved error messages with description of error.
